name: emoji-rpg-monorepo
description: Voice-controlled Emoji RPG game with React Native app and Node.js server

scripts.postinstall: cd app && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.typecheck: cd app && npm run typecheck && cd ../server && npm run typecheck
scripts.lint: cd app && npm run lint && cd ../server && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd app && npm run lint:fix && cd ../server && npm run lint:fix
scripts.clean: cd app && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../server && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
